page.title: 17Trips out from Framlingham
page.content: The coast is the most popular choice for a day out in the Summer,with Aldeburgh,Sizewell and Minsmere most favoured. Felixstowe is within easy reach. For many people a shopping trip to Ipswich is a day out, with its new swimming pool a special attraction. Other favourite places to visit within the county are Easton Farm Park, Tunstall Forest,Kessingland Wildlife Park,Pleasurewood Hills Amusement Park and Earsham Otter Trust.Open days at the Air Force bases are popular, with boys in particular. Most people have been on at least one day trip to London with coach transport often laid on by local firms.Other frequent coach excursions include Woburn Abbey,Windsor Safari Park and Alton towers. The County Show, at which many local firms exhibit, is another Framlingham outing.
